# 雪城大学计算机与网络安全讲义（CIS643&644）v0.1

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xuecheng-daxue-jisuanji-yu-wangluoanquan-jiangyi-cis643-644-v0-1
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xuecheng-daxue-jisuanji-yu-wangluoanquan-jiangyi-cis643-644-v0-1
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xuecheng-daxue-jisuanji-yu-wangluoanquan-jiangyi-cis643-644-v0-1
xuecheng-daxue-jisuanji-yu-wangluoanquan-jiangyi-cis643-644-v0-1 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xuecheng-daxue-jisuanji-yu-wangluoanquan-jiangyi-cisliusisan-liusisi-v0-1
xuecheng-daxue-jisuanji-yu-wangluoanquan-jiangyi-cisliusisan-liusisi-v0-1 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
